name: codetogether
description: Add CodeTogether Live to VS Code to live share your IDE and coding sessions. Cross-IDE support for VS Code, IntelliJ and Eclipse. Free plan always available!

id.description: Launch configuration identifier on the CodeTogether Live Host

executionId.description: Binding to the remote launch on the CodeTogether Live Host

initialConfigurations.name: Creation of new remote launch configurations is not supported

codetogether.userName.description: Specifies a name for participants to recognize you in sessions.

codetogether.backendUrl.description: If your company uses an On-Premise deployment of CodeTogether Live, set the edge-server or locator URL in this setting.

codetogether.debug.description: Enable debug logging of CodeTogether Live connection setup

codetogether.virtualCursorJoin.description: Define how the Virtual Cursor is assigned when joining a CodeTogether Live Session. This can change at any time once you are in the Sesion.
enumDescriptions: When Joining get your own cursor, don't follow the host.

codetogether.virtualCursorRemember.description: Remember Virtual Cursor setting when joining a CodeTogether Live Session and join when ready.

codetogether.terminal.revealOnGuestActiv.description: When a guest types in a terminal, bring it to front (host only).

commands.title: Activate current object (will also save if dirty)
You have unread messages in browser

commandPalette.when: codetogether.session.active == false && codetogether.session.anotherParticipant == false && codetogether.state.ready && codetogether.state.privateDeployment == false

codetogether.session.active == false && codetogether.session.anotherParticipant == false && codetogether.state.ready && codetogether.state.privateDeployment && codetogether.team.connection.status =~ /^(?!(^disconnected|connecting|ssoauthenticationrequired)$).*$/
codetogether.session.active == true && codetogether.session.anotherParticipant == false && codetogether.state.socketTimeout == false
codetogether.state.loggedIn == true && codetogether.state.privateDeployment == false && codetogether.session.active == false && codetogether.session.anotherParticipant == false
codetogether.state.privateDeployment == false && codetogether.session.active == false && codetogether.state.loggedIn == false && codetogether.session.anotherParticipant == false
codetogether.state.privateDeployment == true && codetogether.session.ssoAuthUrl && codetogether.state.loggedIn == false && codetogether.session.anotherParticipant == false
codetogether.session.active == false && codetogether.session.anotherParticipant == false && codetogether.state.privateDeployment == false

codetogether.session.active == false && codetogether.session.anotherParticipant == false && codetogether.state.privateDeployment && codetogether.team.connection.status =~ /^(?!(^disconnected|connecting|ssoauthenticationrequired)$).*$/

view/item/context.when: codetogether.team.connection.status == connected && viewItem == sessionContainer && codetogether.team.hasActiveTeams == true
codetogether.team.connection.status == connected && viewItem == participantSessionContainer && codetogether.team.hasActiveTeams == true
viewItem == terminal-read-only || viewItem == terminal-read-write || viewItem == terminal-shared || viewItem == terminal-not-shared

editor/title.when: codetogether.session.active == false && codetogether.session.anotherParticipant == true && codetogether.cursor.editor.state == waiting-for-others
codetogether.session.active == false && codetogether.session.anotherParticipant == true && codetogether.cursor.editor.state == alone
codetogether.session.active == false && codetogether.session.anotherParticipant == true && codetogether.cursor.editor.state == driving
codetogether.session.active == false && codetogether.session.anotherParticipant == true && codetogether.cursor.editor.state == watching
codetogether.session.active == false && codetogether.session.anotherParticipant == true && codetogether.cursor.editor.state == pseudo-alone

viewsWelcome.contents:
CodeTogether Live Session Unavailable


Connection has been lost to the CodeTogether Live server.

Welcome to CodeTogether Live!


Please wait while VS Code starts up the CodeTogether Live extension.


Extension is starting...

Welcome to CodeTogether Live!


[ Host New Session ](command:com.genuitec.codetogether.session.start)
Host and invite others to securely code in this IDE from their browser, or their own IDE.


 To join a session, either use the Teams area below or join [by invite URL](command:com.genuitec.codetogether.session.join) to start collaborating from inside a new IDE window.



 Source is end-to-end encrypted.

Welcome to CodeTogether Live!


[ Host New Session ](command:com.genuitec.codetogether.session.start)
Host and invite others to securely code in this IDE from their browser, or their own IDE.


 [ Join Remote Session ](command:com.genuitec.codetogether.session.join)
Connect to a remote session to start collaborating from inside a new IDE window.



 Source is end-to-end encrypted.

Reconnecting to CodeTogether Live


The connection was lost to the CodeTogether Live backend. Attempts will be made for up to 1 minute to reestablish the session connectivity.


 [ Disconnect ](command:codetogether.session.cancel.reconnect)

Welcome to CodeTogether Live!


[ Host New Session ](command:com.genuitec.codetogether.session.start)
Host and invite others to securely code in this IDE from their browser, or their own IDE.


 [ Join Remote Session ](command:com.genuitec.codetogether.session.join)
Connect to a remote session to start collaborating from inside a new IDE window.



 Source is end-to-end encrypted.

 You are using CodeTogether Live anonymously. [Log in](command:com.genuitec.codetogether.login)
Connecting to your CodeTogether Live Teams server...

[Get Pro](https://www.codetogether.com/oZOd/buy-pro/) to increase guests & remove time limits. [Recheck Access](command:codetogether.saas.refresh.user) if you have already purchased.


[Start a Team](https://www.codetogether.com/oZOd/team/start) for more functionality like write-access to terminals, server sharing, and streamlined session access to peers.

You are a CodeTogether Live Pro with no session time limit when hosting.


You can [Start a Team](https://www.codetogether.com/oZOd/team/start) now for more functionality including write-access to terminals, server sharing, and streamlined session access to peers.

Your CodeTogether Live Pro access has expired; [renew now](command:com.genuitec.codetogether.renewPro) to remove session limits. [Recheck Access](command:codetogether.saas.refresh.user) if you have already purchased.


Alternatively [Start a Team](https://www.codetogether.com/oZOd/team/start) now for more functionality like write-access to terminals, server sharing, and streamlined session access to peers.

Have a Teams or Pro account? [Log in](command:com.genuitec.codetogether.login)


[Get Pro](https://www.codetogether.com/oZOd/buy-pro/) to increase guests & remove time limits.


[Start a Team](https://www.codetogether.com/oZOd/team/start) for more functionality like write-access to terminals, server sharing, and streamlined session access to peers.

Network issue detected trying to connect to the CodeTogether Live server. Check network connectivity.


Reconnecting...


[Disconnect](command:com.genuitec.codetogether.team.gooffline)
The CodeTogether Live session you were connected to has ended.

CodeTogether Live Teams Offline


You have disconnected from the CodeTogether Live Teams server. You will not have access to active sessions or be available for invitations to CodeTogether Live.


[Reconnect Now](command:com.genuitec.codetogether.team.goonline)
You must first authenticate with your organization's single sign-on service to access the Teams management console.

Welcome to CodeTogether Live!


To continue using CodeTogether Live, you must first authenticate with your organization's single sign-on service.

[ Connect ](command:com.genuitec.codetogether.team.sso.authenticate)

CodeTogether Live Session Ended


The CodeTogether Live session you were connected to has ended. You can now close this window
